data.text: Asafi xa lɔnni bɛɛti
N misaali nde falama wo bɛ,
muxu fe naxee mɛ, muxu fe naxee kolon,
Muxu mu nee nɔxunma e bɔnsɔɛe ma,
Ala bara yaamarie masen Yaxuba bɛ,
alako di naxee fama tina, nee xa nɔ a kolonde,
Na kui e fama e xa lanlanteya sade Ala ma,
E mu luma alɔ e benbae,
Efiramikae xali kanyie naxa e kobe so gere ra,
e mu Ala xa saatɛ rakamali,
E naxa nɛɛmu a xa wali magaaxuxie ra,
A kaabanako raba nɛ e benbae ya xɔri Misira, Sowan fiili ma.
A naxa baa ibɔɔ, a e ragiri,
A naxa e raɲɛrɛ nuxui saabui ra yanyi ra,
A naxa fanye ibɔɔ gbengberenyi ma,
A naxa ye ramini gɛmɛ longori ra, a lu alɔ xure.
Kɔnɔ e mu gbilen e xa yunubi rabafe fɔxɔ ra,
E naxa Ala mato donsee maxɔrinfe ra.
E naxa Ala mabere a falafe ra,
A bara ye ramini fanye kui,
Ala to na mɛ, a naxa xɔnɔ ki fanyi ra,
barima e mu nu laxi Ala ra,
Na kui Ala naxa yaamari fi koore naadɛe xa rabi,
«mana» xa goro e ma baloe ra,
Birin naxa na sɛnbɛmae xa taami don, e fa wasa na ra.
Ala naxa foye rafa keli sogetede biri,
naxan a niya xɔnie xa goro e ma
A naxa e gbegbe rayolon e yonkinde tagi,
E naxa na don han e wasa.
Kɔnɔ hali e to nu bara donse sɔtɔ,
Ala xa xɔnɛ man naxa goro e ma,
Hali na birin to raba, ɲama mu tin gbilende e xa yunubie fɔxɔ ra.
Na kui a naxa e lu e xa fuyante kui,
Fo faxɛ na dutun e ma,
e e ratu a Ala nan e sɛnbɛ ra,
Kɔnɔ e nu wama a madaxufe e xa wɔyɛnyie nan na,
A xa fe mu nu na e bɔɲɛ ma,
Kɔnɔ Ala to findi hinnɛnte ra,
A nu a kolon a bɛndɛ nan tun lanxi e ma,
Sanmaya yeri e murutama a ma gbengberenyi ma,
E nu luma Ala mato ra,
E mu e ratu a sɛnbɛ ma.
E nɛɛmu a xa tɔnxumae ma a naxee masen Misira bɔxi ma.
A naxa e xa Nili xure nun a salonyie findi wuli ra
A naxa xɛɛrie radin e ma e halakife ra.
A naxa tugumie radin e xa xɛe ma,
A naxa e xa wɛni sansie kana balabalanyi ra,
Balabalanyi naxa e xa xurusee faxa,
A naxa a xa xɔnɛ xɔrɔxɔɛ ramini e ma,
A naxa a xa xɔnɛ fulun e ma,
A naxa Misira di singe birin faxa,
Na nan a ra a naxa a xa ɲama ramini alɔ yɛxɛɛ gɔɔrɛ,
A naxa e xanin bɔɲɛsa kui gaaxui yo mu e sɔtɔ,
Na ki, a naxa e xanin a xa bɔxi sɛniyɛnxi ma,
A naxa bɔnsɔɛe keri e ya ra,
Kɔnɔ e man naxa geregiri Ala Xili Xungbe Kanyi ma,
E naxa e makuya Ala ra,
E naxa a raxɔnɔ e xa kuye batudee ra,
Ala to na fe mɛ, a naxa xɔnɔ ki fanyi, a Isirayila rabolo.
A naxa a xa lingira rabɛɲin Silo, a nu naxan tixi mixie tagi.
A naxa a xa saatɛ kankira lu yaxui sagoe,
A to xɔnɔ a xa ɲama Isirayila ma,
E xa fonikee naxa gan tɛ ra,
e xa sɛrɛxɛdubɛe naxa faxa santidɛgɛma ra,
Marigi naxa keli
A naxa a yaxuie bɔnbɔ,
A naxa Yusufu bɔnsɔɛ rabɛɲin,
A naxa Yuda bɔnsɔɛ sugandi,
A naxa a xa hɔrɔmɔlingira ti alɔ yire itexi,
A naxa a xa konyi Dawuda sugandi, a a tongo gɔɔrɛ ya ma,
a nu mɛɛnife yɛxɛɛ ma dɛnnaxɛ,
Dawuda naxa mɛɛni e ma a bɔɲɛ fiixɛ ra,
